text: Mago'a vahe'mo'za Jisasina amanage hu'za asmi'naze, Jonima amage'ma nentaza disaipol naga'mo'za, hakare zupa ne'zana a'o hu'za mani'ne'za nunamu huvava hu'naze. Hagi Farisi mono vahe'mokizmi disaipol vahe'mo'za anazanke nehazanagi, kagrima kamage'ma nentaza naga'mo'za nezane, tinena nevava nehaze.
